1100011111011000 1010111110011000 1 -> sum: 0111011101110001, cout: 1
0001001111111111 0101101100111100 0 -> sum: 0110111100111011, cout: 0
1100010101011000 1000100111111110 0 -> sum: 0100111101010110, cout: 1

0101100110011100 1001001101010100 1 -> sum: 1110110011110001, cout: 0
0011100100110001 1111101011011010 1 -> sum: 0011010000001100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
